title: Maria Ressa, Canadian tech pioneer named to UN's AI panel
description: Journalist and Nobel Peace Prize laureate Maria Ressa of the Philippines, and Canadian artificial intelligence pioneer Yoshua Bengio are among 40 experts selected to serve on a United Nations AI panel, officials announced Wednesday.

title: Why Mastering AI Has Become Non-Negotiable for Consulting Professionals
description: Artificial intelligence has evolved from a competitive advantage to an existential requirement for consulting professionals. As client expectations shift and AI-enabled competitors reshape market dynamics, consultants must integrate AI capabilities into their practices or risk obsolescence in an increasingly technology-driven industry.

title: Generative AI App Spending in South Korea Surges More Than Fivefold
description: SEOUL, Feb. 5 (Korea Bizwire) — South Koreans are spending far more on generative artificial intelligence apps, underscoring how quickly the technology has shifted from novelty to necessity — and raising fresh questions about the future of the mobile gaming market. In-app purchases for generative AI apps in South Korea surged 513 percent last year to [...]The post Generative AI App Spending in South Korea Surges More Than Fivefold appeared first on Be Korea-savvy.
